definitions: without boundaries between countries, administrative divisions, or other areas

examples.text: we want to share our space and live in a borderless region
naval forces will continue operating from an essentially borderless domain

shortDefinitions: without boundaries between countries or other areas

definitions: without restrictions caused by movement between or actions across boundaries of countries, administrative divisions, or other areas

examples.text: the era of unlimited competition and borderless economy

shortDefinitions: without restrictions caused by movement between or actions across areas

examples.text: the uniform spread of blue light creates a borderless space

definitions: lacking the plain or decorated strip typically included around the edge

examples.text: the printer can produce a 4x6 inch borderless photo in 36 seconds

shortDefinitions: lacking plain or decorated strip around edge
